rules.natural: If the drone unit is operational, then the surveillance vehicle is deployed.
The drone unit is operational, or the monitoring station is functional.
Whenever resources are allocated, the research grant is funded.
Provided that the expedition is authorized, when funding is secured, resources are allocated.
If the plant population is healthy, then the natural region is preserved.
Whenever the species is threatened, it becomes extinct.
Provided that the alien species is detected, if the plant species is invasive, then the species is not extinct.
The alien species is detected, or the bio threat is reported.
Whenever the bio threat is reported, if the plant species is invasive, then the species is not extinct.
If the logging activity is illegal, then harvesting is not permitted.
Either the logging activity is illegal, or if the ecosystem is rehabilitated, then the habitat is restored.
If the conservation area is designated, then the habitat zone is protected.

Provided that evidence is documented, if it is not the case that the logging activity is illegal does not imply harvesting is permitted, then the violation is discovered, which leads to the offender being penalized.
Evidence is documented, or the offense is verified.

If the offense is verified, then whenever it is not the case that the logging activity is illegal does not imply harvesting is permitted, then the violation is discovered, and the offender is penalized.
Under the condition that the conservation practice is sustainable, the management is effective.
If the environment is beneficial, then the natural region is preserved.
Provided that conservation is successful, the environment is beneficial.
If progress is measured, then biodiversity is improved.
Provided that the impact is assessed, if management is effective, then conservation is successful.
If the ecosystem is monitored, then when the natural region is not preserved, the plant species is endangered.
If the plant species is native, then the flora is endemic.
If the flora is endemic, then the water source is not polluted.
Provided that the monitoring system is functioning, if the monitoring station is functional, then the natural region is preserved.
Either the data stream is reliable, or if the equipment is maintained, then the monitoring system is functioning.
If the measurements are valid, then either the readings are accurate, or the data stream is not reliable.
If the instruments are calibrated, then the procedures are standardized.
The instruments are calibrated, or the sensors are verified.
Provided that the sensors are verified, the measurements are valid.
If the ecosystem is stable, then the population is declining.
Provided that recovery is observed, if the plant population is not healthy, then the ecosystem is stable.
Recovery is observed, or growth is documented.
Whenever growth is documented, increase is measured.
Provided that improvement is confirmed, if the plant population is not healthy, then the ecosystem is stable.
If increase is measured, then improvement is confirmed.
Whenever the access zone is restricted, the water source is not polluted.
The access zone is restricted, or the forest region is patrolled.
Whenever the protection laws are enforced, the water source is not polluted.
Whenever it is not the case that the conservation project being approved implies that the monitoring station being functional leads to the natural region being preserved, then funding is secured.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the logging activity being illegal implies harvesting is permitted, then the violation is not discovered.
If it is not the case that the conservation area is designated or the ecosystem is monitored, then the water source is polluted.
Provided that it is not the case that progress is measured or the impact is assessed, then the data is conflicting.
If it is not the case that progress is measured or the impact is assessed, then the data is not conflicting.
Whenever it is not the case that the procedures being standardized implies the measurements are valid, then the data is inconsistent.
Provided that it is not the case that the procedures being standardized implies the measurements are valid, then the data is not inconsistent.
If it is not the case that the forest region being patrolled implies the protection laws are enforced, then the regulations are violated.
If the plant population is not healthy, then the species is threatened.
If the plant population is not healthy, then it is not the case that the population is declining.
If the natural region is not preserved, then the ecosystem is rehabilitated.
Under the condition that the natural region is not preserved, the plant species is not endangered.
Whenever the natural region is not preserved, the habitat is not restored.
